Armor.name: Slime Handler Robes
Armor.Description: These robes don't offer much protection against attacks. However, they are imbued with a slight magical property that makes the user resistant to poison.

Armor.name: Tunic
Armor.Description: This "tunic" is basically a shirt made of patchy cloth. It probably doesn't even offer protection against a bee sting.

Armor.name: Tunic
Armor.Description: This tunic offers minimal protection - but it's better than nothing.

Armor.name: Void Handler Robes
Armor.Description: This robe doesn't offer much physical protection. However, they do offer some protection from being noticed by beings that are best left alone.

Armor.name: Dino Scale Armor
Armor.Description: These shoulder pads have been cobbled together using a handful of dinosaur scales.

Armor.name: Dou
Armor.Description: The armor preferred by samurai. This one isn't particularly well-crafted...

Armor.name: Dou
Armor.Description: The armor preferred by samurai. The interlocking plates offer great protection while still being quite light.

Armor.name: Dou
Armor.Description: The armor preferred by samurai. The interlocking plates offer great protection while still being quite light.

Armor.name: Dou
Armor.Description: The armor preferred by samurai. This armor has a cuirass rather than interlocking plates, but is still very light.

Armor.name: Orcish Plate Mail
Armor.Description: This orcish plate consists of a few pieces of heavy metal slabs melted over some chain mail. It's heavy, and doesn't allow for much movement...but offers incredible protection.

Armor.name: Orcish Plate Mail
Armor.Description: This orcish plate consists of a few pieces of heavy metal slabs melted over some chain mail. It's heavy, and doesn't allow for much movement...but offers incredible protection.

Armor.name: Orcish Plate Mail
Armor.Description: This orcish plate consists of a few pieces of heavy metal slabs melted over some chain mail. It's heavy, and doesn't allow for much movement...but offers incredible protection.

Armor.name: Orcish Plate Mail
Armor.Description: This is orcish plate mail favored by the best orcish troops. It is quality-made, consisting of heavy slabs of metal essentially melted together. It affords excellent protection for those strong enough to wear it.

Armor.name: Plate Mail
Armor.Description: Even rusty and decaying, this armor still provides good defense. Unfortunately, it's not as durable as it once was...

Armor.name: Plate Mail
Armor.Description: This armor doesn't represent the finest craftsmanship, but it still offers excellent protection.

Armor.name: Plate Mail
Armor.Description: This is a fine example of plate mail. It does restrict movement, but it offers excellent protection.

Armor.name: Great Helm
Armor.Description: Even rusty and decaying, this helm still provides good defense. Conveniently, parts of the eye holes have rusted out.

Armor.name: Great Helm
Armor.Description: This helm looks like someone took a bucket and nailed holes through it, and then called it a helm. Whatever - it still provides solid protection.

Armor.name: Great Helm
Armor.Description: This is a quality-made helm. It offers incredible protection, but the lack of curvature can be susceptible to piercing attacks.

Armor.name: Jousting Helm
Armor.Description: This jousting helm was made with tournaments in mind. It isn't flexible, but it is light. Since it was made with jousting in mind, the curved nature of it provides superior piercing protection.

Armor.name: Kabuto
Armor.Description: The helmet preferred by samurai (well, maybe not this one...)

Armor.name: Orc Mask
Armor.Description: Broken and well-used, this mask is still offers effective protection. For the parts of the head it covers, anyways.

Armor.name: Orc Mask
Armor.Description: Not pretty, but this mask coves the top-half of the head quite well. Effective protection against wild overhead swings.

Armor.name: Orc Mask
Armor.Description: This helmet is extremely heavy. For those with the stamina to wear it, it offers exceptional protection.

Armor.name: Orc Mask
Armor.Description: This helmet is ludicrously-heavy. For anyone strong enough to wear it, it offers peerless protection.

Armor.name: Sallet
Armor.Description: This sturdy helm provides excellent protection and doesn't restrict too much movement. The curved nature of it provides better-than-usual protection against piercing attacks.
